https://www.dropbox.com/s/7japr88qkey7thp/2015-01-13_00002.jpg?dl=0

The build a space station with power, antenna, and docking port wont complete... can someone build me something as an example? I have tried so many different ways..

Can it support 5 kerbals?

Has your station been built and launched AFTER you had accepted the contract?

Check if you actually have power - mere batteries are not enough. You'll need either solar panels or RTG

Edited January 13, 2015 by cicatrix
Everything but the antenna, power, and docking port part wont check off

Do you have antenna, power and docking port?

A picture of the station once in orbit and the expanded contract tab (the contract thing on the top right) with the various green check/uncheck would really help us pinpoint what's the problem and/or if you have found a bug.

Does it have:

- Capacity for enough Kerbals? (They don't need to be filling the seats, just that there are enough seats)

- Batteries?

- Solar panels or RTGs? (Gotta generate electricity somehow)

- Docking port?

I think most folks forget either solar panels or batteries.

ok I'll get another pic but, I havnt forgotten anything

- - - Updated - - -

https://www.dropbox.com/s/btjidt9u1bcatyb/2015-01-13_00004.jpg?dl=0

Everything was made new,

cockpit

hitch hiker

antenna

batteries/charger

solar panels

2 docking ports

2 years left on contract

Hmm that's weird... Everything seem to be there. If you made this AFTER accepting the contract, there is no reson it shouldn't complete, really.

Maybe some expert admin here would have a way to look into the save file to determine what the game consider to be "missing"... it might be a that you found a new bug sadly

That said, you could cheat and complete contract using the debug window (<MOD> + F12 ), although it won't give you the end of contract money/science/reputation. But you won't pay the fine on failure either (and you keep the advance money).
Very odd, looks like everything is there. I suppose it could be a bug. You could use the Alt-F12 debug menu to force completion. Could something have broken off?
Ive been stuck on this for a long time, it's a easy contract, its just not completing.. It just bothers me it wont complete lol
Can you please upload the save so others can test this?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/o3g0u8gb9bv1bcu/persistent.sfs?dl=0

I think I did that right
